fields.name: I Got Your Back (C1)
fields.value: While Sweeping Time and Breastplate are both in effect, the chance of Breastplate's healing effects activating is increased to 100%.

fields.name: Combat Maid (C2)
fields.value: Decreases the Stamina Consumption of Noelle's Charged Attacks by 20% and increases her Charged Attack DMG by 15%.

fields.name: Invulnerable Maid (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Breastplate by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: To Be Cleaned (C4)
fields.value: When Breastplate's duration expires or it is destroyed by DMG, it will deal 400% ATK of Geo DMG to surrounding enemies.

fields.name: Favonius Sweeper Master (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Sweeping Time by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Must Be Spotless (C6)
fields.value:
Sweeping Time increases Noelle's ATK by an additional 50% of her DEF.
Additionally, every enemy defeated during the skill's duration adds 1s to the duration, up to 10s.
